page.title: 18Celebrations in Alton (2)
page.content: At Harvest Festival in September, we all bring food to school.We invite some old people to visit us,we sing to them, do some dances and give them tea and cakes.Later we take flowers and parcels of food to them. On Hallowe'en my friends and I dress up as witches and ghosts and go to the houses of people we know. We say "Trick or Treat?"and if they say "Treat"they have to give us sweets.If they say "Trick"we play a small trick on them. On the 5th of November we celebrate Bonfire Night.We have a big bonfire and fireworks and then jacket potatoes and soup. When Prince Charles married Lady Diana,we had a street party with food, competitions and dancing.
